scene.text: ZZZzzz...
ZZzz...arf...grunt! Who's there?!
Ah...it’s you.
Hi! I’m Chaplin.
I guess you haven't got your Habbo character, yet.
A Habbo like me, I mean :)
Ok, follow me.
Welcome to Habbo Hotel, Sir! Enjoy your stay.
Oh thanks, it's my ELEVENTH stay this week :)
Hi, MC_Luther! You’re the first, man.
What’s up, Chap? I got your message… and here I am!
Hello there! Welcome to Habbo Hotel!
Girl-Commando ready and in position, Chaplin!
Neat! So, who wants to start first?
Me! I'm going Lido-diving!
Mm... I've got my usual messy room :)
I'm gonna DJ in a minute.
Howwww!! Arf arf...
Hello Boomerang, you sweet thing.
Welcome to my digs! I fixed it MY way :)
It’s cozy! And... almost tidy :)
Refreshments! Habbo Cola!
Help yourself, Chap. It’s fresh&free.
Hey, where did you hide your tech-gizmo?
Mm... see what’s in my Hand.
Here you go. Habbo Rollers aplenty!
Cool :)
I won them in a tough race :)
Let's roll with the new Smiling Headbangerz’ single.
Wuuuff!
Roll&Rock... Yay!
Habb-core!
C’mon Boomie, join us!
Auuuuuu!
Lame dog, lame.
*Feels dizzy*
Woah! looks like I've got a weak stomach :(
You’re such a sugar-boy :)
But now I've gotta go, Chap.
Hi there! Hope you liked my hangout.
I'm looking forward to visiting yours soon :)
Bye!
Thanks Jess! :)
Now, wanna check in and create your Habbo?
Just click on the teleport.
Or you can continue the guided tour.
Yo! MC_Luther, today your place's packed!
As usual! Now get ready...
Party-time is NOW!
Your room rocks! Greetings from Fiji Islands!
W00T! This is the place, this is the time.
Habbos, cheer Chaplin and his friend!
Cheers!
Cheers everyone!
Actually, I prefer Christmas trees to techno :)
:O
Argh! Chap, DON'T play wacko with my stereo!
But no prob, we go rhyme-slinging then.
It's a dance off. Oh yes.
I'm a virtual emcee, I give Habbos cool stuff
Well you can party rough, but you don't give us bucks
Oh you don't implore, it's fun we're here for
You speak for yourself, I love furni and the pelf
Oh baby you're cold, impossible to hold
You don't let love rule, what you get is ridicule
This party is sooo cool, it makes me drool :)
But alas, now it's time to go.
Wanna beam in? Just click the teleport.
Or you can continue the guided tour.
HABBOOOOOM!
Scary! I'd never have the guts to freefall 30 feet.
Oh c'mon, it's the thrill of the dive!
I LOVE it :)
My dig is a friendly swim :)
A rare moment of glory...
Blondes aren’t just looks! This takes skill.
So... let’s gooooo...
Splash-tastic!
You light my fire, baby!
Go blind, you silly boy :)
So how did you like it, Chap?
Simply breathtaking :)
Cool! But I'm already getting bored...
You all, wanna have a catwalk party?
Yeeeees!
Born for modelling!
Ok, let's all meet in my room then!
Everyone’s a star!
Bling bling!
Wow, the place emptied pretty fast, huh?
Habbos can be SO restless.
Argh, what happened? I was at the loo...
Waaaaiiit... I wanna party, too!
Yup. Exactly :)
Now, wanna splash in Habbo Hotel?
Just click on the duck.
Or you can continue the guided tour.
You've had taste of Habbo Hotel now...
...but the REAL thing is waiting inside!!
It's a simple mantra.
Just click the log in button...
...create your own Habbo...
...use the Navigator to move around and build rooms...
...and the Console to connect with new friends.
All the rest is up to you to discover!
What about me?
Well, after this tour I need rest...
...and dreams :)
I'll see you later in Habbo Hotel.
Join uszzzzzz...
Or follow me to The End.
